patthana15.31:1.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana15.31:2.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana15.31:3.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakenaci viññeyyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
